text: In the middle of a marble floor, a single display case to by a crystal dome. DISTANT BUZZING. A SHAFT of light appears. Then a BURNING INCENSE STICK. mm wafts down.

The incense stick is upside down, being lowered into the room. As the smoke spreads, it reveals laser beams that f a security barrier. The incense stick is held by a muscular hand, followed by powerful forearm sporting the tattoo of a Chinese Dragon. Black hair, a black headband with red Chinese characters, dark eyes in a handsome, upside-down face; followed by th rest of BOBBY WANG -- in red muscle shirt and black jeans He is tied upside-down with a red nylon rope. His powerfu body moves like a contortionist to avoid the interlocking laser matrix as he's lowered toward the display case. A thin tube slides down his arm. A liquid drops onto the glass and HISSES as it flows in rivulets down the side. B takes a hammer, covers the crystal with a cloth and taps gently. CRACK. Bobby carefully pries a piece away. He rea in and plucks a JADE ARTIFACT from its pedestal.
THE CHAI TAO... a piece of jade carved into part of a Chi ideogram... a puzzle in Chinese characters.
A 3D rendering of the JADE PIECE rotates. Text windows ap connecting it to historical references..."T'ang Dynasty."

STEVE TAYLOR studies his computer. He's 29, smart and confident. He studies a hologram of the SAME JADE ARTIFAC Using a voice-recognition computer, he tries to fit it an TWO OTHER SHAPES into a complete CHINESE PUZZLE; the CHAI TAO. He's also on the phone.

Yeah Dad, I know what time it is but I thought you'd like to know. The piece we just put on display, I think I found out what it really is. Something even more interesting! Yeah! A piece of the Chai Tao! The CHAI TAO! Well, according to legend it was created by YAMA, the God of Hell. It's the key to unearthly power.
The 3D model, breaks into three pieces, two phantom piece rendered in wire-frame, the museum's piece in full color.
It disappeared. ..around 580 AD. Rumored to be separated into THREE PIECES, each piece held by certain moral humans for safety.
One security camera is picking up Bobby Wang, but Steve doesn't notice.
No, it's not the complete Chai Tao, but it sure looks like one of the pieces! TILT Z AXIS BACK TEN. What? I don't know. Priceless! ZOOM IN 20.
I found it in the Fung collection. Maybe old man Fung was a sorcerer. What? Of course it'll be here in the morning, but it's so exciting I just thought you'd like to know. No? Really?

He slowly slips the JADE from the case, puts it in his pocket. As he does, he dislodges the hammer. It drops fro his pocket, hits the glass with a PING. The glass shatter and falls, cutting the laser beams. ALARM! Bobby screams command into a throat mike.
Heur-La! Fi-dee! Heur-La! HEUR-LA! (Go! Now! Go go go!) Giou La! (Let's get out of here!)
Steve's still on the phone, engrossed in the puzzle when ALARMS BLAST.
What's that? It's nothing... Just the alarm. (suddenly realizes) Look, I gotta go! Bye Dad! (slams down the phone.) Damn! He leaps up, runs out.

The tripod hits and tumbles, dragged by the Cycle.
He roars by as GUARDS run out screaming into radios. The tripod tumbles across the lawn. STEVE runs out, sees the Flame Lords ZOOM by. A ROAR. He turns.

A CYCLE bears down on him. Bobby grins maniacally. Steve DARTS left. The CYCLE darts LEFT. STEVE darts RIGHT. The CYCLE leans RIGHT STEVE feints LEFT, dives RIGHT, just as The CYCLE RIPS BY... Steve goes tumbling. He rolls and flips onto his feet, a to give chase when he notices the rope whipping at his fe He turns. The tripod tumbles straight at him. He dives to side, lands in a fountain. COP CARS pull up, SIRENS WAILING, LIGHTS FLASHING, blocki the exit.
Bobby whips out a sword. With one swipe he parts the rope He rockets up the front hood of a cop car and launches ov it. Cops tumble out. They hop back in, just as...
tumbles up and smashes into the cars, wedging between the

Five young men and women of mixed ethnic types, mostly As Americans in leather jackets with Red Dragons. They wear bands with Chinese characters. The cycles sport dragon pennants. They're neon streaks as they ROAR by.

More cops join the chase and close in. The FLAME LORDS sl into LITTLE CHINA, swerve around blind corners, boots kic sparks. They roar up a culvert. Cop cars appear at the to Lords swerve, pull up, surrounded. The Lords gun their choppers up a ramp into an alley whic turns into a luge tube. They rocket down out of sight. In a flash they are gone. In Little China they are invincible, protected by an architecture of secret ramps, tunnels and bridges. Two cops run up, find them vanished, scratch their heads in disbelief.
A mix of stills, animation and live action featuring magi and martial arts. Scenes from the first "Big Trouble" mov remind us that this is a world where anything can happen.

Steve and CLARENCE JAMES, a bearish, black SFPD Detective walk though Chinatown. Steve's haggard, sleepless, stress out and exasperated. Clarence grins and waves to merchant He is known and liked in Little China. He takes a fresh lichee nut from a fruit stand, nods to the grocer, pops i into his mouth.
Listen, I already told this to the guys downtown.
Indulge me. Tell me again. Try one of these, they're great. Lu Wong, a Chinese merchant waves to him.
I haven't had any sleep! e Clarence takes another fruit.
Insomnia?! Ah... Lo quats! Good for the blood. Thanks Lu.
You believe that?

Listen, kid. There are really two Chinatowns. The one you know is restaurants and knick knack shops. The one you don't know is a mystery. You know, wizards, magic, that kind of stuff. STEVE looks at Clarence quizzically.
I know it sounds funny, but they believe it. And it affects how they behave.
Like breaking into a museum to steal an artifact, you mean?
Yeah, exactly. Now, tell me again, what were those motorcycle guys wearing?
Black jackets with red dragons.
Flame Lords.
Flame Lords?
You know about the Lords?
Who hasn't?
They work for Chi Lung. A real @ charmer. Extortion, smuggling, white slavery... Nothing we can pin on him yet. Any blue and green cycles?
No. Why?
White Hearts. Rival gang. Run by Egg Shen, another local character.
Egg Shen? Isn't he some sort of martial arts master?
Oh, he's kind of an old crack pot but he's got lots of interests in Chinatown. A tour bus company...a curio shop. He's also supposed to be involved in the occult. Steve turns to him, curiously.
The occult?
It's Chinatown, pal. Some of our guys come outta there babbling about demons, magic potions and stuff.
Really? Egg Shen, eh?
This stuff may sound silly to us, but it's very real to them.
It doesn't sound silly to me. I studied Asian mysticism at Berkeley. Clarence looks at him curiously, then shrugs.

The older Chinese still believe in magic. Chi Lung and the Flame eS Lords take advantage of that. Gives them power. There was big trouble here a few years ago. Some truck driver wandered in, got himself shanghaied by devils at least that's what some people here think. Personally, I think the boys got hold of too much plum wine. But it raised a hell of a stink downtown.
Devils? Well...magic or no magic. I have to get the jade back.
What's so special about it?
If it's what I think it is, it's the piece of a puzzle. A very, very interesting puzzle. Clarence just looks at him straight-faced...Then turns an grabs a sweetsour bun from a vendor.
Hey! He suddenly stops, points to the street corner.
In the crowd, Yee, the Flame Lord. He spots Steve, turns takes off, slipping into the crowd.

That's one of them! One of the thieves! Clarence looks up from helping himself to a Chinese pastr He sees Steve bolt, turns, slams into a delivery boy. Cho Fun noodles fly all over the street. Clarence and the boy down, all tangled up.
Wait! Hey, wait! But Steve's off and running. Clarence struggles up but teve's already gone, disappearing into the crowd.
Zipping in and out of the crowd, bumping tourists. He run up a street lined with shops for herbal medicines, food, tourist goods. Ahead, a glimpse. The Flame Lord's headband disappears ar a corner.
Broken field running through the crowd, over trash cans, around barriers. He turns the corner and finds himself in
...a QUIET, DESERTED SIDE STREET off the tourist track, l with the dim windows of small shops. But the Flame Lord h disappeared.

A Pacific Power truck is parked in front of a SMALL CURIO SHOP. A boom is extended and a worker is affixing a power line to the building. BRAD, a youth in a hard hat, sets o barricades, yells to his partner in the boom basket. Steve notices the partner, a pretty Asian-American woman CHAN, 22, wearing a t-shirt and jeans. She cannot hide he beauty under a hard hat. As she leans out of her basket t wrestle with the power lines, Steve is drawn to stare. rad's a body builder with a Gold's Gym T-shirt and a Forr Gump/Fast Times at Ridgemont High demeanor. He has the ho for Kim but they're co-workers. There's an underlying sex tension as he controls her basket height.
Down a little. Up a touch.. Ahh...that's it. Down. There, that's good.
Yeah, it was good for me. How was it for you?
She's very pretty, lithe and strong. She leans over her p attaching wires, glances down at Brad grinning up at her.
Don't start with me, Brad. Try to be professional for once.
He glowers, mumbles to himself.
What the hell am I supposed to do, work with my eyes closed?
See a guy in a red headband come through here? Steve's standing on a power cable. Brad moves him back.
Excuse me, pal. Don't stand there, please. We've got hot stuff up there.
Yeah, I see. Kim leans over, straining her t-shirt. She's very sexy.  w t
The wires, I mean.
Oh, yeah. Sorry. Brad looks up at Kim impatiently.
Think you'll get that tied off before the Year of the Weasel is ever and the Year of the Banana Slug begins?
Actually, it's the Year of the Pig.
The Pig. Oh. Good.
Hey Brad, it's your year.

Yah, funny. (to Steve) Well, it’s gonna be the year of the fat lip if you don't get off my cable. (he coils cable,mumbling to himself) I'm in the truck with her all day. It's driving me nuts. (notices Steve's still there) Something I can do for you, buddy?
A guy. About twenty. Red Headband. Black and red jacket. Flame Lord.
I didn't see nothing. ‘Specially no Flame Lord.
How about an antique shop?
This whole neighborhood is one big antique shop.
I'm looking for Egg Shen's.  12. He shows Brad his map. Brad studies it, glances up.
You're in luck, pal. You're here. He points at the sign EGG SHEN ANTIQUITIES hidden by Kim' basket. Steve looks around. He senses eyes watching him. Then, a shout!
Hey! You gonna get those ties or what? They look up at the impatient girl hanging over the baske

Keep your shirt on! (sees her stiffen, hands the map back) Damn! I'm a diabetic in a candy shop! Grumbling, he turns, slams open the truck doors -- WHANG! Kim glances down at Steve. Their eyes meet for an instant then she turns back to her work. Steve turns to the CURIO SHOP, stares in the window.
It's dark. Nooks and crannies are stuffed with Oriental curiosities. The window sports pieces of jade.

(to himself; surprise, wonder) Min din yuk! Burma jade...Wow! The shopkeeper, EGG SHEN, an old but tough Chinese, looks from his antiquities and stares back. He comes to the fro and looks out. Steve excitedly indicates the jade.
Is that goo yuk, that sun shan yuk? (antique jade, new jade)
Who are you, Bok gwei?
It seems that Egg Shen is looking past him toward KIM... on the boom. He's polishing something.  be w
Ngor hai gai dook shu. (I'm a student, an acolyte.) Ngor man nee see gow. (I need your advice.) I seek wisdom.
You seek pronunciation. You just called yourself a cabbage leaf... but I'm impressed.
He polishes a jade piece. It's similar to the museum piec put not identical.
Steve focuses in on it. He can't quite see. He's about to make a move toward the shop when he sees a reflection in glass. He turns.

Yee stares at him, tapping ninja-sticks in his palm... Fr other corners other Flame Lords appear. SFX - BOOMING CYC ENGINES. Flame Lord choppers turn a corner and ROAR up. The Lords pull up, REVVING their choppers. One kicks over barrier. It slams into Brad's truck with a LOUD BOOM! Bra rockets out of the truck holding his head and SCREAMING.

Hey! What the... !? Bobby Wang just laughs at him. Brad stops dead in his tra Two other Flame Lords move up grinning and swinging ninja sticks. One says something demeaning in a Dialect. Others laugh, snicker, move to surround Brad. He backs away.
Flame Lords zoom past. An ancient Chinese nimbly darts ou their way. But Steve doesn't move fast enough. A Lord sla into him, knocks him down.
looks down.

(They are pigs!) She's angry, not intimidated. She snaps a kick that brush the Lord's nose and snaps his head back. He stumbles back Kim takes a stand. The Lords surround her, mumbling threa

You're bothering her. He turns on Steve...threatening. Moves up into his face, grins menacingly.

know who you are.

The jade you stole from the Heritage Museum. The Lords stiffen, look to Bobby Wang. Bobby moves forwar
Cop?
Assistant Curator. A beat... Bobby starts giggling.
Oh....worse. Assistant Curator! Very scary! The Lords snicker, then snap into a menacing stance. Steve takes a defensive martial-arts stance. They stop an look at his moves. Then they laugh.

No, no, no. It's like this. He snaps into a very serious stance; deadly, practiced, agressive. The other Flame Lords also click into exaggera poses. They put on a demonstration of much better moves. Superfast fighting, flying, tumbling. Bobby finishes with tumbling, whipping combo that catches Steve by surprise, sending him into a pile of garbage.
You should leave Little China, BOK GWEI! (white ghost/Anglo) Steve jumps to his feet. Bobby moves toward him. they mix up. Steve is surprisingly good. They exchange quick combo  16.

is moving into an attack stance. Yee goes for her. In a quick, surprising combo, Kim flips, tumbles, kicks, punch and sends Yee through the window of CHEE FUN LAUNDRY. He stumbles out, covered in dry cleaning. Bobby laughs.
Nei gum lyang! You're beautiful!
Nei gum aie! You're short.
(he laughs delightedly) You're angry. (swings onto his chopper) ..I...like that. Get on.

I'll see you again.
(sarcastic) I'll lie awake nights. He laughs, nods to the Flame Lords.
They race off.
rushes out of his shop.
Flame Lords!!! (they hesitate) Nei gall guy! You're off limits! A beat...then Bobby steps up to him.
Hey, old man, what kind of gang would we be if we obeyed the rules? Bobby hops on his cycle, gives Egg a mock salute, pops th clutch, SCREECHES away. Lords vanish into the woodwork.
Brad's awestruck at Kim's fighting skills.
Geez, Kim! Where'd you learn to do that?
Women's support group. She walks up to Steve, lying in the garbage, picking fish heads out of his hair. Kim stands over him, hands on hips
Thanks for your help.
Don't mention it.
But you shouldn't interfere. Not here.
Sorry. Thought you were in trouble. Obviously, a mistake.
(she studies him) The Flame Lords are dangerous. You better leave Little China. 17.
What about you?
I work here. Anyway...they'll leave me alone.
Yeah, so I see. She looks him up and down, then notices Egg. Steve follow her look, sees Egg picking up jade from his smashed displ They approach. Egg looks up, notices their interest.
It's not wise to stand against the Flame Lords.
I can take care of myself.
Yes, I observed. Egg hands Kim a jade piece.
Jade...magical. The only gemstone that changes color when you touch it. It reacts to body temperature, chemistry...some say...to the person himself. Or herself.
It turns lighter in Kim's hand.

He studies the jade and Kim. He seems to see something. He smiles at Kim, slips back into his store. Kim and Stev look at each other for an awkward moment. Kim admires the small gift of jade. She notices a broom, grabs it and sta sweeping glass fragments into the gutter.
You're lucky you're in one piece.
Yeah, I'm feeling luckier... by the moment . (he moves in) You're from Guangdong.
I'm from Alameda.
You're parents, then... southern Canton.
How can you tell?
Your Cantonese...has a provincial dipthong. Que Ling?
You're close.
Really!?
Yeah. They're from Oakland. Dad's a systems analyst at Rockedyne. I'm as American as Charlie Chan.
But you speak Cantonese.
I yell it. That's all I know... except for some curses on your ancestors, bok gwei.
I'm not a white ghost.
No, who are you then?
Assistant curator at the Heritage Museum.
I thought you were kidding.

No... really. I...I was born in Bejing. My father was teaching there. I've been studying Chinese Cc ure all my life. If the jade piece I'm looking for is what I think it is, our troubles are just beginning.
Our troubles...? She laughs at this. SIRENS and LIGHTS up ahead. Cop cars SCREECH. Glass BREAKING, cars CRASHING! BRAD runs up, hop in the truck, starts it up. Kim hands Steve closes the door

Come on, Kim. My contract specifically states I don't have to work during earthquakes, atomic attacks, or civil disturbances. the broom, gets in the passenger seat. Steve for her. She glances curiously at him.
What did you say you were?
A... a collector.
Oh..? Of what?
Beautiful things. A beat. A moment between them. Imperceptibly, she smiles.
Well...I've gotta go.
Joy Geen. (goodbye)
Yeah. See ya around. Brad pops the clutch, squeals out.  21.
Wait!
Later! Kim stares at Steve as Brad squeals away. A CLATTER! Stev turns as Egg pulls down metal shutters on the shop.
Wait! I want to talk to you.
Can't talk now. Good bye! Egg slams the door, heavy bolts CRASH SHUT. Steve's left alone, deserted in Little China.

Chi Lung admires the stolen JADE as Bobby looks on proudl Chi is ancient, powerful and dressed like a mandarin. His room's furnished in exquisite art. He's evil, but witha quirky, Alan Rickman/Jeremy Irons sense of humor. Bobby's attitude has changed. He is uneasy before this powerful sorcerer. Bobby notes the frenzy with which Chi makes certain incantations. He notices that Chi's entranced by the stol jade.
Thank you, boss. By the way... this hunk of stone must be pretty important to you, huh?
(very scary, threatening) You are interested in the secrets of my power?
Ahhh...no. No. Not really. Just curious, that's all.
You wouldn't think of questioning my authority...
Me? NOoooo....
Your loyalty to me is...
...uh..UNquestioned...Totally!
You were a lowly street hood and I made you...  23.
Leader of the Flame Lords, your magnificence, and I am deeply grateful. It's just... well, we need... money.
(angry) Money! You want money?!
You know... for expenses last night. Gas, rope...tolls for the bridge...
(angry) Money?! From me?? A FORCE BEAM shoots from Chi's palm, impales Bobby and li him by the throat, levitating him, choking...
Ah...no. N-never mind. Forget it. Sorry I mentioned it. (Chi turns away. Bobby slams to the floor.) Oooof! I mean, how do you do all this neat evil stuff, anyway?
Oh, you know. The usual. Pact with the devil. Knowledge that is power... all that. But, with certain... limitations. And you know how I hate limitations!
Oh boy, do I! CHI LUNG calls up images. Chinese ideograms appear.
That's why I've studied the ancient texts.
The ones you had me steal?
Borrow. Short term loan. They've revealed the CHAI TAO! The SECRET MAGICAL ARTIFACT that will give me
Bobby snatches the jade from Chi's hand.
That?... Chi snatches it back. Light dims to just a highlight on C and the jade.
This jade...One of the THREE PIECES separated by YAMA, to prevent their power from falling into...
(helpfully) Evil hands? Chi glares daggers at him.

Well, when I have the complete Chai Tao, that won't matter, will it? He opens a curtain revealing the golden statue of the god Yama. He places the jade in the statue's outstretched han An unearthly GONG RINGS. Bobby staggers, holding his ears
What the hell is that!
Yes. As a matter of fact, Hell is exactly what it is.
What?!
Yen Lo, Servant of Yama. I summon thee! A THUNDERCLAP! Bobby grabs his ears and cowers. Chi looks down with disdain. And unearthly HOWL. The statues SHUDDE
Boss, you been dipping into the Bok Fun again!  25.

Pay attention! I have... (He whips out another piece from beneath his robes.) combined TWO PIECES of the Chai Tao. The clock now starts. We have 12 hours from the time the TWO PIECES are combined... to find and take possession of the THIRD.
Or what? Wait a minute...Or what?!
A...slight penalty clause. If we fail to find the third piece we will be slaves of the demons of Hell for all eternity.
Oh, is that all? Huh? What do you mean... "we"? BOBBY grows uneasy as...
Statues around the room are changing, coming alive.
Besides I'm sure there's a loophole. ..somewhere. (glances at Bobby) Something bothering you?

Uhh. ..Nothing..No... except ...Maybe...well, if I didn't know better, I'd swear that (points to a gargoyle) that is...coming...to life! (suddenly wants to depart) Listen, don't pay me now. I'll just put it on your tab. Chi places a second JADE PIECE on the altar. They emanate power. A RUMBLING HOWL FROM HELL! Gargoyles move. Terrified, Bobby snatches ONE OF THE JADE PIECES, holds i before him like a protective talisman. Chi is outraged.  26.
What are you doing, you fool!
You never mentioned the part about Hell.
Must've slipped my mind.
If this has power, maybe it'll protect me.
Give me that, you twit! (Bobby shrinks back) Don't worry. You're with me!

Yeah sure! The guy about to go to Hell. Great! Look, I want protection! Bobby's demand triggers a change. The jade GLOWS. He drop it, burning his hand. Chi snaps it up, hides it in the fo of his robe. The room RUMBLES! Walls EXPLODE! In a burst radiance, Yen Lo arrives. And he is pissed! The Servant of Yama confronts Chi. YEN LO is as big and s as Jack Palance on a bad hair day. He's dressed in blue robes, a conical hat, with a silver serpent embroidered o his chest. He looms over the others, intimidating...
Who commands me?
I, Chi Lung, have summoned you, Yen Lo, servant of Yama! He shows him the JADE PIECE set in the Yama statue. Yen i shocked.
By this piece of the Chai Tao I lay claim to all power over the universe!

One piece alone is not enough, Chi Lung. You must now accompany me to HELL... NOW!  27. Chi Lung smatches THE JADE from the Altar and fits it wit the SECOND PIECE he whips out from beneath his robe. A FL Yen Lo is blown back into a dragon throne. The dragons co alive, snake around and hold him fast.

You've grown careless, Yen. I have not one...but two! I now make my claim over the CHAI TAO, and when YOU help me get the THIRD AND FINAL PIECE, ultimate power wi be mine! Yen Lo struggles mightily but the combined power of the t artifacts traps him, holds him on the throne. Bobby's awe
You can hold him there?
Not for long, Chi Lung. The judges have been summoned.
Judges, what judges?
Oh, the ones from Hell. Now, I really NEED the third piece.
You have just twelve hours!
Then what?

All Hell breaks loose. (he laughs chillingly, then snaps to serious threat...) Twelve hours... to take possession of the third piece. Chi waves..-Thunder! Lightning! Flames and smoke break ou The room ROCKS under the evil spell. Chi stands up to it.
Right. And we both know where it is.  28.

Steve. Steve Taylor.

eo (frightened) Chi Lung!

Me?! (Chi nods) Well, who's got the other piece? How do we get it? Chi grins down at Yen.
You wouldn't care to tell? (Yen Lo flips him the Chinese Bird.) Egg Shen, perhaps?

Good wizard? Good wizard? Oh, he likes to call himself that. Truth is, it's all about power. I've known for years, Egg had the THIRD PIECE. But I didn't dare move until some fool found the SECOND piece and put it on display in a museum!...
Egg's tough. How do we get the piece away from him?
My plan is simple. In a word... Trouble. Big Trouble.
That's two words.
{turns and bellows!) Flame Lords! Doors burst open. Flame Lords rush in. They fall into ran at stiff attention. Chi Lung struts before them like Patt  32.

{to Bobby) You give Egg a message. Unless he surrenders the final Chai Tao, Little China will be reduced to... to... Egg Foo Yung! (turns to the ranks) Flame Lords...Out! Out! Begone! Be BAD! Cause Trouble! He claps. The Lords RUSH OUT for a spree of destruction.

Now do you believe me?
No. But I do need all the help I can get. (He smiles. He's kidding. ) Come, grasshopper. We must prepare. He zips through the maze, grabbing a vial here, a lacquer there. Steve hops to follow.
Lung quat; Dragon Bones. Fut show; Buddha's Hand. Mow ngon; Cat's Eye...And...tiger bile. Tannis blossom. Lichee tea.
Tea?

Replaces electrolytes lost fighting demons. Some mandrake root... corn starch for body. Now mix it up. Steve mixes it. Egg drinks. A TRANSFORMATION! He's no lon a wizened old man, but a powerful wizard.  65. Egg turns to Kim. He offers the potion. She ignores it. Steve sneaks a sip.
You deny your heritage?
My heritage? Subservience to men... to the old ways?
Ahhhh...yes. You are overly rational. Not a common failing among women.
(irritated) Thank you. Steve just smiles at Kim...he feels the potion taking eff
{to Steve) What are you staring at?
Steve spreads his hands. A faint charge flickers between palms. Egg's intrigued. He points to a glowing incense co on his altar to his ancestors.
If you really believed... one could pick it up in your bare hands ...that is, if you are truly worthy.
And if not?

Oh, it'll burn the hell out of you. You must have faith... or a comprehensive health plan. Egg looks at Steve critically, gauging his reaction. Steve picks up the fiery ember. Egg's intrigued. Steve glances at Kim, loses concentration, cries out, drops the coal.
Of course, hot coals are a problem for those with short attention spans.  66. Egg picks up the coal, pops it into his mouth, swallows i He burps discreetly. A small flame bursts from his mouth.
Excuse me. See, not just faith but heart. Otherwise all you'll wind up with is heartburn. Egg winks at Kim. He knows there is a growing attraction between Steve and Kim. Brad senses it too.
(testily) Come on.
What?
We gotta go.
Go?
This is not our fight... or whatever it is... I mean, we have a job to do. She looks at Steve.
Oh, that's okay. I'll stay and fight alone. Kim turns, hesitates.
Alone? You two against all the forces of Hell?
That's alright. We can handle it.
You couldn't handle a Kung Fu move last time I looked.
Thanks for your concern. Bye.
You don't think you need help? You don't think he does?
Come on. They don't need you.
They need me. They just won't admit it.
Yeah, well, what can you do? A beat as she considers.
I'll stay. You go.
Go? Where am I gonna go? You're my partner, right?
Right.
Even when you're wrong, right?
Like now, you mean?

Right. I must be out of my mind, but there's one thing I do know... there's no such thing as magic. Just then, a GIANT FLAME BALL bounds up the street and bu through the windows. The flaming ball roars at them. Stev steps in front of Brad and Kim and catches it in his hand
No such thing as magic... eh, Brad?
Steve stands holding the FLAME BALL. His hands FLAME. A ghostly image of Chi Lung appears in the room.
Does it burn and sizzle?!
No. I like to do this.
Give me the third piece of the Chai Tao or... The FLAMES ROAR. So does Steve.
Mind over matter. Mind over matter!
Do you mind? It's my matter.
Help him!
You must treat the bad magic with contempt. {turns to Kim) You must also believe...
Me?
Yes. It couldn't hurt. Kim closes her eyes, concentrates. The jade GLOWS.
(to Steve) Relate it to something real.
Something real? The last time I was holding a ball of fire. Let's see... it was my birthday cake. I made a wish.
Make it now. You can do it!
T can't.

Make a wish!! This gets him. A look of determination crosses his face. Steve stares at his hands burning fiercely. He takes a deep breath and blows with all his might. The flame flickers out. Chi's gone. Egg's pleasantly surprise
Very good, grasshopper.
What did you wish for?
Train set. Same as always.
Well, whatever it was, it worked. I'm proud of you.
You mean that?
Yeah, proud as any inscrutable person can be. There may be hope for you two yet.
What are you talking about?
Yin and Yang. Man and woman. Each incomplete without the other. But when they come together,
(He punctuates with a tiny explosion.) You are not one of us, but... you have something. Here... the ancient texts. Maybe if you two work together... They glance at each other awkwardly.  70.
Nothing personal... It... it would just be magic.

(laughs) Yeah...sure. At Egg's gesture the walls open up to reveal a LABORATORY with potions, flasks, distilling apparatus, magic swords, armor... a distillery and armory of magic. He gathers the Magic Spheres seen earlier.
You've heard of Aladdin's lamp. Well, same thing. The holder of the complete Chai Tao can ask a wish. Chi Lung will ask for ultimate power for evil.
Oh... is that all. Steve's beside himself with excitement. He runs his hands over the books. Then he notices the White Hearts appear. Double Chin looks alert, on guard.
It's okay, they're with us. Double relaxes a touch...studies Kim, Brad, Steve. A SUDD EXPLOSION. The room rattles..Dust sifts down.
Egg, you better help us. The Flame Lords are tearing the city apart! Suddenly, there's a ruckus outside. They rush to the wind
Flame Lords rush up. Citizens try to fight back, but they no match for the Flame Lords. SCREAMS!
White Hearts. Come On! They rush out. Kim follows...
No. Wait! Wait for the magic! He just doesn't listen... Come on! Egg frantically stuffs the Magic Spheres into a pouch.
The White Hearts give chase, followed by Kim, then Brad a Steve. Egg brings up the rear lugging the pouch.
The Flame Lords rush in and disappear. The White Hearts follow... then look around... uneasy.
They're gone. What do we do?
Prepare to Die!

head_text.subj: A MAGICAL IMAGE SHIFT, (OR A CHEAP DISSOLVE)

text: The empty alley is filled with Bobby and the Flame Lords demonstrating demonic powers, nasty weapons and bad attitudes. They surround and move in to attack. The Heart are rushed from all sides.
rushes up with his pouch of magic. He rolls the spheres a the Flame Lords... They burst into shrapnel.

fight valiantly, twisting, kicking, leaping. Even Double impressed. But the Demonic Lords are too much. The White Hearts are driven back. A RUSH. The Demons focus on Kim, grab her and drag her of Brad lunges for her, but comes up with just the JADE NECKLACE. A Flame Lord tumbles him into a corner.
battles madly, but there are too many. They rush him. He disappears in a pile of writhing demons. His pouch drops. final sphere tumbles out.

makes a grab for the last of the exploding spheres. It ro towards a sewer grating... Steve dives for the sphere. Just as it drops into the sew he intercepts it, tosses it blindly in the Flame Lords' direction. It EXPLODES!
The dust clears. The demons are gone. So are Egg and Kim. Steve helps Brad up and notices the necklace.
It glows and throbs powerfully.
They walk off quickly into the dark, spooky night.
Steve's entranced by the jade. Brad is freaking out!
Jeeshhh! Truck's trashed! Kim's gone. Hey, those were some scary demons! Demons?! My god!
They took Egg. We gotta find him. And Kim.
Yeah, Kim... I hope she's alright. Hey, how am I gonna explain this to the company?
Do you understand? they kidnapped Kim!
Yeah, Boy, I hope those demons know what they're doing. They get on the wrong side of her, they'll wish they'd never been born... or whatever demons are.
w They turn into another blind alley and stop. Too late.
You wonder why they took them and not us?
Should we be insulted?
It must be the jade.
What jade? You mean this? Brad reaches for the jade just as four Flame Lords drop d from above. One snatches the jade from Brad and holds it triumphantly. Steve snatches it back and runs.
Through alleys, tunnels, passages. Steve scampers ahead. The jade holds them off.
Steve breaks into an open area lit by a trashcan fire tha throws scary shadows on the walls. One shadow's a demon. grabs for Steve. He ducks but Brad is caught, dragged off
No. Lemme go! You can't do this. I'm in the union!
turns back to help. He's jumped. They fight. Steve's out- numbered. A Demon stuffs Steve head-first into a trashcan The demonic Lord steps back, pleased with his work.
Chai tao sun! Bong ngor! (Puzzle God, help me!) A BOLT shoots out of the can, enveloping the demon. Steve BLOWN OUT, spinning.

He rights himself, holds the jade out before him. He land softly, amazing himself as much as the demons. He's singe but okay. He unclenches his fist, notices...  74. cu - STEVE HAND The jade has left a burning imprint.
Ayee yaa! Jun Bong do ngor! (Wow, he really did help me!) The Lord's now just a pile of smoking ash. Steve's alone. studies the jade curiously. It changes color.
Jeezzz. I got ‘em, Brad. (he looks around) Brad?... Where are you? Steve stands in the alley... alone.
Egg and Kim are imprisoned along with a number of sobbing young girls. Brad is carried in and dumped on his head.
Ooof! Hey, I believe you've just violated my civil rights. You're in big trouble now! The demon LUNGES AND ROARS at him. It curls Brad's hair. rapidly scrambles backward, away.
And do something about your breath. He catches sight of Egg.
Whew! These guys are kinda lax in personal hygiene. He spots Kim.
Kim...there you are... He looks around.
Kim. Where the hell are we? She looks at Egg.
Not exactly Hell... but close. Egg is calm as a Buddha, but Kim is seething.
How can you sit there so calmly?!
What's wrong?  76.
What's wrong?! We've been captured by demons, imprisoned with a bunch of whining... young. ..virgins.
Yeah... (eyeing the virgins) virgins.
And you... Great Wizard! Why don't you do something! Egg looks up from his meditation.
Why don't you!
Me?
Trust the Chai Tao.
Iocan't...I'm not...
You must! Chi Lung has to face the Judges of Hell. He doesn't have the complete puzzle. He'll stall ... maybe offer them virgin sacrifices for more demons. And to keep them amused.
Yep. That would do it for me.
Sacrifices? Human sacrifices!?
I'm afraid so.
Wow! Good thing I'm not a virgin. (Kim glances at him) What are you so mad about? You're off the hook, aren't you? Kim stares at Brad for a beat.
Well... we can't do anything here. Let's find a way out.
There is no way out.
There's gotta be... She walks toward a doorway... BLLLZZZT! She's blown back.
For the first time, The mystic bands are too strong.
You're a top wizard! Why don't you do something?
You must do it. You must use the Chai Tao. (She stares at him.) ...the jade.
This...? (reaches for her necklace) It's gone.
Gone?! What do you mean?
I mean I don't have it anymore. he shows fear.
Then, we are in Big Trouble. a my
I could'a told ya that!
{starts to panic) I must've lost it during the fight.
Well the Flame Lords don’t have it.
Steve had it. But the last I saw of him, they had him over a barrel.
(suddenly hopeful) But he's not here. He's not captured. Maybe he does have it.
SUDDENLY, A RATTLING ROAR. Chi's LAUGHTER is HEARD. The w SHAKE, start to DISSOLVE.
.I revealed the ancient ways to him. If he evaded the Flame Lords Steve must have the magic well in hand.
A MASSIVE EXPLOSION blows out what's left of the windows.
Steve sits at the counter, blackened face, shards of a fl in his hand. He looks up at Double Chin.
Too much Ni-Chi!. I'll just add some Yun-sum root. Double Chin's unsure. Steve's too excited to be intimidat He busily mixes potions from Egg's magical ingredients.
Err... what exactly did Egg say to you?  79.
Uh, you know... the magic... it's really a simple thing if you follow the formulas. Of course, you have to believe, have faith and all that.
Did he say anything about talent? ..-You know, a feel for the thing? Steve adds a powder. A small BLAST rattles the windows.
Did he mention liability insurance?
I'm gonna take all this stuff and go and get him and Kim... Maybe Brad.
You?! Against Chi Lung?! You're just gonna walk in?
No, I'll take the bus.
You're crazy! (to White Hearts) Come on, Hearts, let's go. We'll take care of this ourselves! They turn, march out.

They emerge to find Steve standing there. Stunned, they t back to shop and see Steve also standing inside. BACK TO EXT. The outside Steve raises his hands parallel to each other Electricity dances between them.
How'd you know how to do that?
Oh, the Mau Soot! ...the "Two places, One Time”? It's nothing. Ancient hat trick. The White Hearts look at each other.
They got demons, they got most of the Chai Tao. They got Egg Shen. I think you guys can use all the help you can get. He creates a hologram of the jade. It shimmers before the
You've learned the magic...

Yeah. And I've made more of Egg's potion. I think it'll enhance strength and speed. At least that's what it says in the book, here. They look uneasy. He offers it. It bubbles from flask to glass and foams toxically.
Go ahead. The first one's always free.
(excessively polite) Oh, no. You first. Then Steve's not so sure. He screws up his courage and swallows it. He drinks, stands blinking and burping.
How d'you feel?
Strong as an ox. (sniff, sniff) ...Same fragrance. Care for a sharpener? He offers the foaming cup. They back away.  At the dare. Double
You want to grow big and strong like the demons, don't you?
How can you know of this?
I'm a quick study.
No. It's impossible for you to lead us, to learn the magic, the ancient ways... Only Egg Shen can know these things.

Oh? (flips, lands in the same place, TWANGS with energy.) Well, maybe it's because my heart is pure. (A flask blows, showering them with shrapnel.) Then again, maybe not. Maybe I need the jade. Well, you want to have a stranger to save your master? Alone? Against all the forces of Hell? Well? Do ya? grabs the potion, takes it in a gulp.
Well...
I think I...feel...something. Hey, I feel great!
That's just the caffeine. Can you move really fast?
How's that?
How's what?
See, really fast.  82. Steve rolls his eyes, but Double turns and high-fives him making a mild thunderclap.

Haiiii Loh! Fat seut do! (Yes, Magical powers! Victory!) He flips, spins, tumbles, darts around the room at incred speed. The White Hearts are clearly seeing double. He's a blur. Then he appears in a flash.
What do you think?
Looks like happy hour at the espresso bar. Who's next? The White Hearts line up, grab cups.
Potion, potionccino, or potion latte? They take the cups, look at each other.
Yuan ho! (Salute!) They ceremonially drink as one. They gulp, smack their li A beat. A BLUR as they flip around the room at double spe
EGG SHEN'S BUS creeps through the darkened streets.
Steve and the Hearts are wired and jabbering like magpies Double Chin notices the sky above the warehouse.
Shhhhh... Uh oh!
The sky boils with swirled lightning and dark clouds.  © w
into Chi Lung's Throne Room. Egg, Kim and Brad and the virgins are transported by Chi's magic and materialize. Chi's more demonic than ever. He grins at the terrified girls, at Egg and Kim.
Ahhh... the thirteen beautiful virgins.
Yeah, practically every one in the Bay Area.
But WHERE IS THE JADE!
The jade? A FORCE BEAM shoots from his hand, grabs Bobby by the thr lifts him off the ground.
(furious) I told you to get the final piece of the Chai Tao from Egg Shen! Time's running out!
He doesn't have it. We looked all over, took his shop apart.
You... you coward! You traitor! His force field slams Bobby up against the ceiling. Chi releases him, he drops to the floor.
Oooof! Overcome with fury, Chi moves on Egg Shen.
Where's the jade, Egg Shen?
With a worthy mortal.  84.
I will HAVE THAT JADE! Force beams fly from his hands slamming them all high up the walls!
I can't believe it! Henchmen, Demons...Black Magical Powers! (SCREAMS to the heavens!) Is there no one who will BRING ME
The bus idles as the White Hearts survey the perimeter. The JADE NECKLACE dangles from Steve's neck.
Well? Double is apprehensive. Other White Hearts report.
Reinforced gate. Tripwires, interrupter beams. Motion sensors...possibly gas.
(turns to Steve) What do you think?
I think this calls for something elegant
Right. Like what?

Flame Lords stand guard. Suddenly, THE DOOR SHATTERS, sending them flying. The bus ROCKETS through, filled with screaming White Hearts, SLAMS into a wall and comes to re steaming. Double shakes his head.
That... was e ant?
I thought so. You know... in terms of simplicity.

The Demon Lords are down but not out. They swarm as the W Hearts tumble off the bus. The battle's joined. It's demon versus potion, magic against magic. The demons are horrific and terrifying, slashing the air with their razor claws. The White Hearts are so quick the demons can nail them, can't land a blow. The White Hearts are flippi overhead. They're everywhere. Double Chin flips to get out of a jam and lands in a cach firecrackers. He rubs them together at super speed, sprin out just as they go off in a Technicolor BLAST!. White Hearts fall upon the demons. The White Hearts penetrate further into the hidden domain. Then... the Dem Lords back away. Double warns...
No! Wait! Hold up! Too Late! The trap is sprung. The walls DISSOLVE and they are in..
Chi Lung's LAUGHTER RINGS IN TRIUMPH!

Chi cackles in triumph as the Flame Lords get to their fe licking their wounds. A FLASH! A BURST OF PLASMA -- shoot from Chi‘s JADE PIECES -- coalesces as an ENERGY BALL in middle of the room. Chi Lung's LAUGHTER stops as, with a BOOMING ROAR, the JUDGES OF HELL appear. If you thought Y Lo was bad, these guys are worse! Snarling, bad-tempered Demon Monsters, each scarier than the other. They glare a Chi with ill-concealed contempt. He puts on a happy face.

(mumbles to himself) ..-not quite ready... (then to the judges) Judges of Hell...Welcome! The FIRST JUDGE just SNARLS. Chi's smile freezes. He turn to JUDGE TWO, who is busy MORPHING into something even mo menacing.

Yah, well... Okay then, right to business! Presenting... He spreads his arms like a Master of Ceremonies. The ligh go up, revealing the whole of Chi's work: Thirteen altars appear in a circle. On the altars the sobbing virgins are bound. Among them, shackled to the wall, are Kim, Bobby, and Brad. And, in a GOLDEN HOLDING PEN with AN ELABORATE MAGICAL LOCK, Steve, Double and the White Hearts... and dangling from Steve's neck, the JADE.
He quickly stuffs it under his shirt before anybody sees.
What's all this?
The virgins? Oh, sacrifices. Down payments on the demons.
Yeah, so what are we doing here?
Kind of an honorary thing. You know, you could save yourself, come to the dark side with me.
I - I don't think so. I don't look good in red and black. And you better watch out for yourself. I think he's crazy.
Yeah, well...I was starting to notice that. He stops as he notices Chi getting more demonically grotesque.
Look! He isn't even human anymore. You think he'll let you live when this is over?
(shocked at the thought) He'd never...
Oh, yeah? Look at your friends. More Flame Lords stumble in. One is badly wounded and GROANING. Annoyed, Chi Lung turns, lofts a PLASMIC BLAST, BLOWS HIM AWAY. Clumps of demon fur float to the floor.
He glares at the smoking spot, turns back to his guests.

Ahem...Now, the sacrifice will please come to order. GONGS RING. Demons come to attention. The ceremony begins Chi Lung goes to the first young woman, putting his hands her shoulders. She struggles in horror.  88

It's alright. It's not even death as we know it. Just the temporary use of your soul. Hardly miss it. Trust me, I know. With glowing eyes, the evil sorcerer starts to pull the girl's soul right out of her body. Her eyes bulge... gree mist drifts out and curls about her head. She struggles a pulls it back.

That's right, don't make it too easy. He leans in, his eyes glow red, his face morphs into a horrible monster. The Virgin opens her mouth to scream. With a SUCKING SOUND her soul exits her mouth as a column pale green smoke. The girl's soul becomes a bright sphere that floats above her empty head.
See, if women would just learn to keep their mouths shut.
(outraged) You... Geu! (pig) Chi Lung turns his awful attention on her. She and Bobby freeze. Chi glares. He takes an interest and moves to her
And who is this?
Ummm, extra added attraction. Kim Fan of the Power Company.
That's Ms. Kim Fan to you! Chi is pleasantly surprised.
Oh, yes. One of Egg Shen's little proteges. Perhaps, also... a quardian of the jade?  89.
I don't have the jade. Chi turns to Bobby, glaring...
Did you check?
What are we wasting our time for... it's not here, boss. He moves to Kim, grinning. ROAR! Bobby's lifted ina PLASMIC BEAM. He flames for a bit, then drops.
Of course it's here, you idiot!! I can feel its presence! Bring the girl to me!
Sprawled on the floor, gets wobbily to his feet. He moves Kim.
(mumbles to himself) I'm an idiot. You're the one going to hell.
Bobby unshackles her.
He's a monster!
This is nothing. You should see when he really loses it.
(moves to Bobby) You're better than this. You don't belong with him.
You really think so? (A beat.) Well, I certainly didn't count on this Hell stuff.  90.
(loudly) You know, you guy's are really Starting to get on my nerves. Chi looks over, BLASTS STEVE. He rolls across the pen tow Brad.
What did you do that for?
I'm trying to get us all out of here.
So far you're doing a great job.. Steve notices Egg, still pinned on the wall.
Egg!! Can you help us?!
Not while I'm held here. Not while the jade's lost.
It's not lost. I got it right here. He holds up the THIRD PIECE OF JADE
Chi sets the other pieces in an altar. He makes incantati The girls' souls drift above their bodies. Bobby brings a struggling Kim towards Chi.
All attention is on the girls' souls. They drift toward t Judges. The Judges look interested.
I promised you virgins, I gave you virgins...
And now... I offer you a bonus. He moves towards Kim. She is clearly not excited about th
(to Judges) Do we have a deal?
We make no deals, Chi Lung.
She works on him.
You think he's going to show any loyalty to you?
Not so easy to find beauty like this in Hell. Quite a prize. Think about it. Chi's grown uglier, demon-like...hellish.
Do not toy with us, Chi Lung. You have a debt to pay... and your time is running out.

head_text.subj: THE GOLDEN PEN WITH ELABORATE MAGICAL LOCK

text: interwoven with scrolls and icons, dragons, and idiograms Using his knowledge of Chinese artifacts, Steve tries to figure out the magical unlocking formula.
If I can just figure out these symbols... I might be able to find a way to free us.
Don't try it. They'll kill you.
I didn't think you cared.  A HOWL from the demonic judges of Hell, 0.S.
Well, whatever you're going to do... Do it fast.
There are symbols... and then there are symbols.
And you went to college for that? The demonic judges move in, ROARING, HISSING, CLAWING.
What am I missing?
You must find the answer for yourself.
That's it!? You got us all into this!! And now you're quoting "The Wizard of Oz"?!
That's it!! The power is in my hands. I've had it all along. The jade!!
Now you're catching on, grasshopper. Steve holds the jade to the lock.
But you cannot do it alone.
(shouting) Kim!! Help me! The demonic Chi Lung snarles. He approaches Steve.
So you have the jade!! Give it to me or you will all die!!
{to Steve) What can I do?
Come on. Remember that phrase your grandmother taught you...
I remember. Of course I remember.
But you must also believe...
Believe... I do believe... I believe... (demons are moving in) I believe I'm in Big Trouble!
Chai tao sun...do! (Puzzle God...come!) Kim breaks free of Bobby. She runs to the golden cage and reaches through the carved lock. Her finger barely touche the jade...
Chai tao sun, bong ngor!... (Puzzle God, help me!)
Yut chai ho hup! (United in harmony!) The JADE FLASHES! The GATE flies open. A ROAR OF FIRE. The White Hearts tumble out. Flame Lords rush to meet the
Chi Lung has completed his change... He's been transforme into an ogre. He turns on them. FLAME balls spew from his hands, his eyes, his mouth...
He's terrified. In a flash, he grabs Steve's jade and hol it up.
Here, Chi Lung. I have the jade!  94. He holds it up. Chi sends out a BOLT and grabs it, but Bo hangs on and is carried over to the altar. He drops. Chi glares at him, eyes burning.

Let them go! Chi Lung! You've got what you want. Chi opens his hand for the jade. Bobby's compelled to release it. Chi grabs the THIRD JADE PIECE, knocks Bobby aside,... and puts all the pieces togeth...

No! Steve leaps at Chi Lung and knocks the jade puzzle apart! three pieces fly off in different directions. Chi sends a FIREBALL BLASTING at Steve. He's knocked down, tumbled un the blast. The Flame Lords attack. Double Chin and the White Hearts take them on.
He throws a BOLT down at the three pieces of jade. They s across the floor, inexorably drawn back toward Chi Lung.
Steve grabs for one piece. He's dragged by it under and through the tumbling combatants.
leaps for the second piece and gets dragged, kicking...
grabs the THIRD PIECE. He is dragged toward Steve and Kim In a few seconds, the Chai Tao will be complete.
Bobby... NO!! Don't let it happen! ! Chi Lung turns his power on Kim. He scorches her with a blast of lightning. She screams in pain.
No, Chi Lung!! Let her alone!!  95.

NO                        ! You worthless toad! ! When I am the Lord of the Universe, I will rid myself of you and your pathetic jabbering. Bobby has had enough. He digs in his heels trying not to the pieces come together but, inch by inch, he's drawn in
No!
(shocked) No?i! Bobby heaves his jade toward Steve. It hits and slides. Everyone dives for it. Steve gets there first.
is furious! A magic sword appears. He SLASHES though Bobb Blood spatters onto the field that imprisons Yen Lo.
slams the two jade pieces together.
Yen Lo appears full-sized and disgruntled. He waves the smoke away. He towers over the terrified Chi Lung.
Judges... the time limit has expired. Your duty is clear. They turn to Chi.

No! I got you virgins. Look at all the trouble I caused. Hell would be nothing without guys like me! Chi takes Kim as a hostage... and grabs the THIRD CHAI TA PIECE from her hand. Steve lunges for him but he threaten Kim with knifelike claws. Kim slams her elbow into his gu  96. The CHAI flies from his hands, lands at her feet. She @ropkicks it to Steve. The demon in Chi rises up, horribl threatening...
Give me that jade... Steve slams the third piece into place and makes the comp
Go to Hell!
As you wish.
LIKE A SPEAR THROUGH HIS SOLAR PLEXIS. He's rocketed up. Below, a hole opens.
Chi Lung is swept in and plunges down... screaming all th way.

They all look down into the chasm. When the dust clears, there is no sign of Chi Lung. There are only bits of clot floating up from the hole. Brad picks up the CHAI TAO, studies it. Yen Lo looks on complaisantly.
Never liked that guy. Kim runs to the fallen Steve. She drops to him.
No. It can't be.
The decision of the judges is final.
No. Please. You must return him to me!
Impossible. She grabs the Chai Tao from Brad, points it at Yen Lo.
The Chai Tao. I can make a wish, right?
That is correct. She slams the pieces together. POP! A BEAM shoots. Virgin souls suck back into their bodies. Flame Lords revert fro demons to punks. The Judges disappear.

I now wish all those who are pure in heart remain... Everyone else can go to Hell!! The air BURSTS, the WIND WHIPS fiercely. The White Heart drop back, shielding their eyes. The dust settles, Kim stands with Steve at her side. Egg is there with the virgins. Yen Lo vanishes.
{to virgins) You know I really didn't think that would work.
I... believed... She and Steve are looking deeply into each other's eyes.. getting lost... Egg Shen prattles on...
You are very impressive for an... American.
Thanks. Steve suddenly notices a lifeless body.
Bobby...
He fought Chi.
And possibly saved his soul.
Aw, you know... He wasn't so bad. He shouldn't go to hell. The Chai Tao glows in Kim's hand. It radiates a greenish/white light.
I think Yen Lo heard you. Bobby's soul will be at peace.
I don’t get it.
(ironic) It's because we Chinese are inscrutable.  They kiss.
The KISS continues. 99.
I don't know, I find you highly scrutable.
You're kind of interesting yourself...in a goyish way.
I'm just trying to learn...
That's admirable, Grasshopper. Now, If you just cut out those one liners. I may take you on.
As your partner?
Apprentice. We must now search for three new guardians for the Chai Tao.
We've got one right here.
